name: SEABREEZE 35 (ALLIED) YAWL
notes:
Available as sloop or yawl.
The standard 380-pound bronze board of the early years was replaced by an aluminum version in 1967 weighing 115 pounds. In 1970 a  Seabreeze 'Citation' went on the market that featured a longer coachroof, a dinette, a two-door head compartment and a slightly longer cockpit (at the expense of lazarette space). The rudder was also changed to a trapezoidal form to fill the gap under the counter overhang.
